mapper.select:
SELECT
tj.name, tj.entrustId, tj.state, tj.case_count, tj.total_case_money, tj.average_count, tj.la_count, tj.la_case_money, tj.cp_money, tj.paid_num, tj.cp_case_count, tj.paid_case_count, tj.ptp_money, tj.ptp_case_count, tj.zlz_paid_num, tj.zlz_paid_case_count, tj.paid_count_rate, tj.paid_money_rate, tj.paid_rate
FROM ( #已还款数量占比（已还款数量/案件数量） #已还款金额占比（已还款金额/案件金额） #确认还款率（已还款案件数量-自来账数量/未确认还款数量+已还款案件数量-自来账数量） #cp2.paid_case_count - zlz_paid_case_count / cp_case_count + cp2.paid_case_count - zlz_paid_case_count #(IFNULL(cp2.paid_case_count, 0) - IFNULL(cp3.zlz_paid_case_count, 0)) / (IFNULL(cp1.cp_case_count, 0) + IFNULL(cp2.paid_case_count, 0) - IFNULL(cp3.zlz_paid_case_count, 0)) #CONVERT( (IFNULL(cp2.paid_case_count, 0) - IFNULL(cp3.zlz_paid_case_count, 0)) / (IFNULL(cp1.cp_case_count, 0) + IFNULL(cp2.paid_case_count, 0) - IFNULL(cp3.zlz_paid_case_count, 0)) ,DECIMAL(18,2)) #as paid_rate #确认还款率【已确认还款案件数量（已确认的还款）/CP确认案件还款数量（cp正常和已确认的还款）】 SELECT en.name,en.id AS entrustId,en.`state`, ci.case_count, IFNULL(ci.average_count,0) AS average_count, CONVERT(IFNULL(ci.total_case_money, 0),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS total_case_money, la.case_count AS la_count, CONVERT(IFNULL(la.total_case_money, 0),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS la_case_money, IFNULL(cp1.cp_money, 0) AS cp_money, IFNULL(cp2.paid_num, 0) AS paid_num, cp1.cp_case_count, cp2.paid_case_count, cp0.ptp_money, cp0.ptp_case_count, cp3.zlz_paid_num, cp3.zlz_paid_case_count, IFNULL(CONVERT((IFNULL(cp2.paid_case_count, 0)*1000) / IFNULL(ci.case_count, 0),DECIMAL(18,2)),0) AS paid_count_rate, IFNULL(CONVERT((IFNULL(cp2.paid_num, 0)*1000) / IFNULL(ci.total_case_money, 0),DECIMAL(18,2)),0) AS paid_money_rate, IFNULL(CONVERT((IFNULL(cp2.paid_case_count, 0) - IFNULL(cp3.zlz_paid_case_count, 0))*100 / (IFNULL(cp1.cp_case_count, 0) + IFNULL(cp2.paid_case_count, 0) - IFNULL(cp3.zlz_paid_case_count, 0)) ,DECIMAL(18,2)),0) AS paid_rate
FROM `entrust` en #案件数量 #案件金额（委案金额之和）委案日期<=D2且退案日期>=D1的案件 #平均案件金额（委案金额（案件的）/案件数量） LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT case_info.id) AS case_count,cb.`entrust_id`, case_info.case_backdate,case_info.`case_date`, SUM(case_info.case_money) AS total_case_money, CONVERT(IFNULL(SUM(case_info.case_money), 0)/(IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT case_info.id), 0)),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS average_count
FROM case_info JOIN case_batch cb ON cb.id = case_info.`batch_id`
WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 and cb.status!=-1 #AND case_info.org_id IS NOT NULL #and (case_info.`case_date` <='2016-11-25' and case_info.case_backdate >= '2016-06-22')
and (case_info.`case_date` <= '${params.normalDate1}' and case_info.case_backdate >= '${params.normalDate}')
GROUP BY entrust_id
) AS ci ON ci.entrust_id = en.id #来案数量 #来按金额（委案金额之和) D1=<委案日期<=D2的案件 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT case_info.id) AS case_count,cb.`entrust_id`,case_info.case_date, SUM(case_info.case_money) AS total_case_money
FROM case_info JOIN case_batch cb ON cb.id = case_info.`batch_id`
WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 and cb.status!=-1 #AND case_info.org_id IS NOT NULL #AND ('2016-11-25'>= begin_date >= '2016-06-22')
and (DATE_FORMAT(case_info.case_date,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY entrust_id
) AS la ON la.entrust_id = en.id #未确认还款（cp正常的cp金额之和） D1=<CP日期<=D2且还款状态为CP正常 #CP确认案件还款数量（cp正常和已确认的还款） LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cb.`entrust_id`,cp.`ptp_time`, SUM(cp.`ptp_money`) AS ptp_money, COUNT(DISTINCT cp.case_id)AS ptp_case_count FROM case_paid cp LEFT JOIN case_info ON cp.case_id=case_info.id LEFT JOIN case_batch cb ON cb.id = case_info.`batch_id`
WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 and cb.status!=-1 #AND case_info.org_id IS NOT NULL AND cp.state='0' #AND ('2016-11-25'>= paid_time >= '2016-06-22')
and (DATE_FORMAT(cp.`ptp_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY entrust_id
) AS cp0 ON cp0.entrust_id = en.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cb.`entrust_id`,cp.cp_time, SUM(cp.cp_money) AS cp_money, COUNT(DISTINCT cp.case_id) AS cp_case_count
FROM case_paid cp LEFT JOIN case_info ON cp.case_id=case_info.id LEFT JOIN case_batch cb ON cb.id = case_info.`batch_id` WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 and cb.status!=-1 #AND case_info.org_id IS NOT NULL AND cp.state = '1' #AND ('2016-11-25'>= cp_time >= '2016-06-22')
and (DATE_FORMAT(cp_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY entrust_id
) AS cp1 ON cp1.entrust_id = en.id
#已确认还款（已确认的已还款金额） D1=<还款日期<=D2 #已确认还款案件数量（已确认的还款） LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cb.`entrust_id`,cp.paid_time, SUM(cp.paid_num) AS paid_num, COUNT(DISTINCT cp.case_id)AS paid_case_count FROM case_paid cp LEFT JOIN case_info ON cp.case_id=case_info.id LEFT JOIN case_batch cb ON cb.id = case_info.`batch_id`
WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 and cb.status!=-1 #AND case_info.org_id IS NOT NULL AND cp.state='2' #AND ('2016-11-25'>= paid_time >= '2016-06-22')
and (DATE_FORMAT(paid_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY entrust_id
) AS cp2 ON cp2.entrust_id = en.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cb.`entrust_id`,cp.paid_time, SUM(cp.paid_num) AS zlz_paid_num, COUNT(DISTINCT cp.case_id)AS zlz_paid_case_count FROM case_paid cp LEFT JOIN case_info ON cp.case_id=case_info.id LEFT JOIN case_batch cb ON cb.id = case_info.`batch_id`
WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 and cb.status!=-1 #AND case_info.org_id IS NOT NULL AND cp.state='2' AND cp.`repay_type`='2' #AND ('2016-11-25'>= paid_time >= '2016-06-22')
and (DATE_FORMAT(paid_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY entrust_id
) AS cp3 ON cp3.entrust_id = en.id
) AS tj WHERE 1=1
and entrustId in
#{params.entrustIds[${index}]}
order by ${sort} ${order}
order by convert(name using gbk) asc

SELECT tj.name, tj.entrustId, tj.state, tj.case_count, tj.total_case_money, tj.cp_money, tj.cp_back_paid, tj.paid_num, tj.back_paid, tj.cp_case_count, tj.paid_case_count, tj.rate FROM
( #确认还款率【已确认还款案件数量（已确认的还款）/CP确认案件还款数量（cp正常和已确认的还款）】 SELECT en.name,en.id AS entrustId,en.`state`, ci.case_count, CONVERT(IFNULL(ci.total_case_money, 0),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS total_case_money, IFNULL(cp1.cp_money, 0) AS cp_money, CONVERT(IFNULL(cp1.cp_back_paid, 0),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS cp_back_paid, IFNULL(cp2.paid_num, 0) AS paid_num, CONVERT(IFNULL(cp2.back_paid, 0),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS back_paid, cp1.cp_case_count, cp2.paid_case_count, cp2.rate AS rate
FROM `entrust` en #案件数量 #案件金额（委案金额之和）委案日期<=D2且退案日期>=D1的案件 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT case_info.id) AS case_count,cb.`entrust_id`,case_info.case_backdate,case_info.`case_date`, SUM(case_info.case_money) AS total_case_money
FROM case_info JOIN case_batch cb ON cb.id = case_info.`batch_id`
WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 and cb.status!=-1 #AND case_info.org_id IS NOT NULL #AND (begin_date <='2016-11-22' AND cb.end_date >= '2016-06-25')
and (case_date <= '${params.normalDate1}' and case_info.case_backdate >= '${params.normalDate}')
GROUP BY entrust_id ) AS ci ON ci.entrust_id = en.id #未确认还款（cp正常的cp金额之和） D1=<CP日期<=D2且还款状态为CP正常 #未确认佣金 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cb.`entrust_id`,cp.cp_time, SUM(cp.cp_money) AS cp_money, SUM(IFNULL(cp.entrust_paid, 0)) AS cp_back_paid, COUNT(DISTINCT cp.case_id) AS cp_case_count
FROM case_paid cp LEFT JOIN case_info ON cp.case_id=case_info.id JOIN case_batch cb ON cb.id = case_info.`batch_id` WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 and cb.status!=-1 #AND case_info.org_id IS NOT NULL AND cp.state = '1' #AND ('2016-01-01' <= cp_time <= '2016-01-31')
and (DATE_FORMAT(cp_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY entrust_id ) AS cp1 ON cp1.entrust_id = en.id #已确认还款（已确认的已还款金额） D1=<还款日期<=D2 #已确认佣金 #平均费率=佣金/已确认还款 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cb.`entrust_id`,cp.paid_time, SUM(cp.paid_num) AS paid_num, SUM(cp.entrust_paid) AS back_paid, CONVERT((IFNULL(SUM(cp.entrust_paid), 0)*100) / (IFNULL(SUM(cp.paid_num), 0)),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS rate, COUNT(DISTINCT cp.case_id)AS paid_case_count
FROM case_paid cp LEFT JOIN case_info ON cp.case_id=case_info.id JOIN case_batch cb ON cb.id = case_info.`batch_id`
WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 and cb.status!=-1 #AND case_info.org_id IS NOT NULL AND cp.state='2' #AND ('2016-01-01' <= paid_time <= '2016-01-31')
and (DATE_FORMAT(paid_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY entrust_id ) AS cp2 ON cp2.entrust_id = en.id
) AS tj WHERE 1=1
and entrustId in
#{params.entrustIds[${index}]}
order by ${sort} ${order}
order by convert(name using gbk) asc

SELECT
tj.name, tj.entrustId, tj.state, tj.case_count, tj.phone_count, tj.visit_count, tj.apply_count, tj.assist_count FROM ( SELECT en.name,en.id AS entrustId,en.`state`, ci.case_count, ci1.phone_count, vrd.visit_count, ci2.apply_count, ci2.assist_count FROM `entrust` en #案件数量 #电催次数 #外访次数 #协催次数 #查资次数 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT case_info.id) AS case_count, cb.`entrust_id`,case_info.case_backdate,case_info.`case_date`
FROM case_info JOIN case_batch cb ON cb.id = case_info.`batch_id`
WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 and cb.status!=-1 #AND (case_date <='2016-06-01' AND case_info.case_backdate >= '2016-05-01')
and (case_info.`case_date` <= '${params.normalDate1}' and case_info.case_backdate >= '${params.normalDate}')
GROUP BY entrust_id
) AS ci ON ci.entrust_id = en.id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pr.create_time, cb.`entrust_id`, SUM(CASE WHEN pr.pr_cat = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS phone_count
FROM case_info JOIN case_batch cb ON cb.id = case_info.`batch_id` JOIN phone_record pr ON pr.case_id = case_info.`id`
WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 and cb.status!=-1 #AND (pr.create_time between '2016-05-01' and '2016-06-01')
and (DATE_FORMAT(pr.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY entrust_id
) AS ci1 ON ci1.entrust_id = en.id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
cb.`entrust_id`, ca.`sur_time`, SUM(CASE WHEN (ca.apply_type = '4' OR ca.apply_type = '6' OR ca.apply_type = '12' OR ca.apply_type = '9' ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS apply_count, SUM(CASE WHEN (ca.apply_type = '11' OR ca.apply_type = '7' OR ca.apply_type = '5' OR ca.apply_type = '10' ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS assist_count
FROM case_info JOIN case_batch cb ON cb.id = case_info.`batch_id` LEFT JOIN case_apply ca ON ca.`case_id` = case_info.`id`
WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 and cb.status!=-1 #AND (ca.`sur_time` between '2016-05-01' and '2016-06-01')
and (DATE_FORMAT(ca.`sur_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY entrust_id
) AS ci2 ON ci2.entrust_id = en.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
cb.`entrust_id`, vr.`actual_visit_time`, SUM(CASE WHEN vr.state = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS visit_count
FROM visit_record vr LEFT JOIN case_info info ON vr.`case_id`=info.`id` JOIN case_batch cb ON cb.id = info.`batch_id`
WHERE 1=1 and info.status!=-1 and cb.status!=-1
and (DATE_FORMAT(vr.`actual_visit_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY entrust_id
) AS vrd ON vrd.entrust_id = en.id
) AS tj WHERE 1=1
and entrustId in
#{params.entrustIds[${index}]}
order by ${sort} ${order}
order by convert(name using gbk) asc

SELECT tj.name, tj.entrustId, tj.case_count, tj.total_case_money, tj.ptp_money, tj.cp_money, tj.paid_num, tj.achieve, tj.target, tj.new_case_count, tj.lose_case_count, tj.involve_case_count, tj.negotiation_case_count, tj.family_case_count, tj.someone_case_count, tj.oneself_case_count FROM (
SELECT e.name,e.id AS entrustId, COUNT( ci.id) AS case_count, CONVERT(IFNULL(SUM(ci.case_money), 0),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS total_case_money, IFNULL(cp.ptp_money, 0) AS ptp_money, IFNULL(cp.cp_money, 0) AS cp_money, IFNULL(cp.paid_num, 0) AS paid_num, CONVERT((IFNULL(cb.achieve, 0) * IFNULL(cp.paid_num, 0)) / 100,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS achieve, CONVERT((IFNULL(cp.paid_num, 0) / IFNULL(SUM(ci.case_money), 0)) * 100,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS target, SUM(CASE WHEN (ci.collec_state_id = '0' OR ci.collec_state_id IS NULL) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS new_case_count, SUM(CASE WHEN (ci.collec_state_id = '30' OR ci.collec_state_id = '87') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS lose_case_count, SUM(CASE WHEN ci.collec_state_id = '34' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS involve_case_count, SUM(CASE WHEN ci.collec_state_id = '88' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS negotiation_case_count, SUM(CASE WHEN ci.collec_state_id = '28' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS family_case_count, SUM(CASE WHEN ci.collec_state_id = '29' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS someone_case_count, SUM(CASE WHEN ci.collec_state_id = '27' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS oneself_case_count
FROM entrust e LEFT JOIN case_batch cb ON e.id=cb.entrust_id LEFT JOIN case_info ci ON cb.id=ci.batch_id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT case_paid.case_id, SUM(case_paid.ptp_money) AS ptp_money, SUM(case_paid.cp_money) AS cp_money, SUM(case_paid.paid_num) paid_num FROM ( SELECT case_id, SUM( IF (state = 2,IFNULL(paid_num, 0),0) ) AS paid_num, SUM( IF (state = 1,IFNULL(cp_money, 0),0) ) AS cp_money, SUM( IF (state = 0,IFNULL(ptp_money, 0),0) ) AS ptp_money FROM case_paid GROUP BY case_id ) case_paid GROUP BY case_id ) AS cp ON cp.case_id = ci.id
GROUP BY e.id ORDER BY ci.create_time DESC ) AS tj where 1=1
AND tj.entrustId IN
#{id}
